name: Aunty Terese's Fattoush
author: Mario
summary: Recipe for a healthy, authentic, Lebanese fattoush salad that is super easy to make!
ingredients: 1 small (4 inch) small pita bread round, split into 2 round pieces
3 small cucumbers, halved lengthwise and sliced
¼ cup coarsely chopped parsley, or to taste
½ teaspoon salt, or to taste
⅛ teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
directions: Toast pita bread in a toaster oven until browned, 2 to 4 minutes; crumble into bite-size pieces
Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, romaine lettuce, parsley, and mint in a large bowl
Mix olive oil, sumac, salt, and pepper into cucumber mixture using your hands
Add crumbled pita bread and toss
